mapper.select: SELECT postId, postName, detailLink, companyName, companyLink, city, industry, time, postType, skill, salary, education, nature, scale FROM post WHERE deleted = 0 AND postType = #{postType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post ( postId, postName, detailLink, companyName, companyLink, city, industry, postType, skill, salary, education, nature, scale ) VALUES ( #{postId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{postName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailLink, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyLink, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postType, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{skill, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salary, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nature, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scale, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET postName = #{postName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detailLink = #{detailLink, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyName = #{companyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyLink = #{companyLink, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postType = #{postType, jdbcType=TINYINT}, skill = #{skill, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary = #{salary, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nature = #{nature, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scale = #{scale, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE postId = #{postId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
